1.question: What is MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory?
1.answer: MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory - tap4.ai is building an ai tools directory that helps you get your favorite ai tools. It can get ai writing tools, ai markting tools, ai paraphrasing tools, ai seo tools, ai study tools, ai generator tools, ai research tools, ai art tools, ai music tools, ai video tools, ai coding tools, ai photo tools and more here.

2.question: How to found your ai tools in tap4 ai tools directory?
2.answer-2: 2. Explore the ai tools in the tap4 ai tools directory.
2.answer-3: 3. Click the ai tools that you need to get the detail and visit it.

3.question: What are the main features of MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory?
3.answer-1: 1. Free AI Tools Directory: It's free to found your favorite AI Tools here.
3.answer-2: 2. Startup List: The free startup list for ai tools developers.

4.question: Is it free to submit ai tools to MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory?
4.answer: Yes, it's free currently. But you should share the backlink for MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory!

5.question: What's the categories list of AI Tools that MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory support?
5.answer: We will support all kinds of AI Tools later. Please wait for a few days.

6.question: What's the frequency for the up of AI tools in MaoMaoYu AI Directory?
6.answer: The list of AI tools will be updated daily.

7.question: Is it support GPT-4o or Sora AI here?
7.answer: You can get the GPT-4o or Sora AI tool here. Here is the introduction of GPT-4o and Sora video, and you can visit the website of the tools.

8.question: Troubleshooting
8.answer: If the content aren't appearing, try a different browser, clear your cache. If issues persist, contact us at support@maomaoyu.coffee.

9.question: How does the content of MaoMaoYu AI Directory get generated?
9.answer: The content of the description of the ai tools is generated by GPT-4o from OpenAI.

10.question: What are the usage rights of the AI tools?
10.answer: MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory is just the AI Directory for AI tools. The usage rights of the AI tools are based on the AI tools' website.

11.question: Does the webui of MaoMaoYu AI Directory is open source?
11.answer: Yes, we will open source the webui of MaoMaoYu AI Directory in the github(https://github.com/6677-ai/tap4-ai-webui). Please star us.

privacyPolicy.1-h1: Privacy Policy for MaoMaoYu AI Tools Directory
privacyPolicy.1-p: This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.
privacyPolicy.2-p: For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way. The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacyPolicy.3-p: I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol ('IP') address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacyPolicy.4-p: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory. This Service does not use these "cookies" explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use "cookies" to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacyPolicy.5-p-1: I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacyPolicy.5-li-2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacyPolicy.5-li-4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used;
privacyPolicy.5-p-2: I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacyPolicy.6-p: I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacyPolicy.7-p: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacyPolicy.8-p: I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

termsConditions.1-h1: Terms of Service for MaoMaoYu AI Directory
termsConditions.1-p: Welcome to MaoMaoYu Chinese Food Recipes! Our website, located at https://cookfoodbook.com ("Website"), is dedicated to providing you with the ability to create custom images. By accessing or using our Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any part of the terms, then you are prohibited from using the Website.
termsConditions.2-p: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Website and its services for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include any rights to copy, modify, or distribute the Website's content or use it for commercial purposes without our prior written consent.
termsConditions.3-p: The ownership of images generated from text on the Website belongs to the person who created the image. maomaoyu.coffee claims no ownership over images created by users.
termsConditions.4-p: We collect personal data (name, email, and payment information) and non-personal data (web cookies) to improve our services. The use of this data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsConditions.5-p: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
termsConditions.6-p: MaoMaoYu AI Directory reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any changes by email. Your continued use of the Website after any change in these Terms will constitute your acceptance of such changes.
termsConditions.7-p: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@maomaoyu.coffee.
termsConditions.last-p: By using MaoMaoYu AI Directory, you signify your acceptance of these Terms of Service.

AIDetail.twice-cooked-pork:
# Twice-Cooked Pork

## Development of the Dish
There are various accounts of the origins of Twice-Cooked Pork. One perspective suggests it originated in the late Qing Dynasty, but a more precise trace can be found in the Northern Song period. Initially known as "oil-exploded pork," its flavor was primarily savory and fresh. With the introduction of chili peppers during the Ming and Qing Dynasties, Twice-Cooked Pork gradually took on the characteristics we know today. By the end of the Qing Dynasty, the creation of broad bean paste further enhanced the taste and quality of the dish, making it one of the most famous representative dishes of Sichuan cuisine.

## Legends and Stories
In the Ming Dynasty, Song Yi recorded the method of making "oil-exploded pork" in "Zhu Yu Fang Za Bu," which is similar to the modern method of making Twice-Cooked Pork. This indicates that the basic features of Twice-Cooked Pork had already taken shape in the Ming Dynasty. The specific record is as follows:
> "For oil-exploded pork, take cooked pork and cut it into thin slices, then fry it in hot oil until fragrant. Add a small amount of soy sauce and wine, then add Sichuan peppercorns and green onions. It is suitable to stir-fry with shredded bamboo shoots and water bamboo shoots."

This account not only reflects the cooking techniques of the time but also shows that Twice-Cooked Pork had already occupied a place in the dietary culture of the Ming Dynasty.

## Flavor Profile
Twice-Cooked Pork is known for its unique taste and color, characterized by:
- **Bright Red Color**: The addition of broad bean paste during the stir-frying process gives the dish an attractive red color.
- **Rich but Not Greasy**: Selecting the right pork belly and cooking it until it is tender, then cooling and slicing it, results in a rich texture that is not greasy.
- **Fragrant Flavor**: The combination of various seasonings, especially the aroma of broad bean paste and Sichuan peppercorns, makes Twice-Cooked Pork full of fragrance.

## Cooking Methods
There are multiple ways to cook Twice-Cooked Pork, each with its unique steps and techniques. However, the basic cooking process includes:
1. Prepare the ingredients: pork belly, garlic sprouts, green onions, ginger, garlic, dried red chili peppers, Sichuan peppercorns, broad bean paste, sugar, oil.
2. Boil the pork belly until it is eighty percent cooked, then slice it.
3. Heat the pan and stir-fry the chili peppers and Sichuan peppercorns with a small amount of oil.
4. Stir-fry the pork slices until they are translucent and slightly curled at the edges.
5. Add the broad bean paste to make a red oil, then add soy sauce or sweet bean paste for color adjustment.
6. Finally, add the garlic sprouts, a little cooking wine, and sugar to season, then serve.

In addition to garlic sprouts, ingredients such as bell peppers, onions, chives, and "guokui" (a type of bread) can also be used to make Twice-Cooked Pork.

## Nutritional Components
The main ingredient of Twice-Cooked Pork, pork, is rich in high-quality protein and essential fatty acids. It also contains heme and cysteine, which promote iron absorption and help prevent iron deficiency anemia. The side ingredients such as bell peppers and garlic sprouts provide a rich source of vitamins and trace elements.

## Nutritional Benefits
Twice-Cooked Pork has the effect of nourishing the kidneys and blood, moistening dryness, and is suitable for people with various body types. However, due to its high content of fat and sodium, people with high blood pressure should eat it in moderation.

## Cooking Tips
When cooking, pay attention to the control of heat and oil temperature to ensure the tenderness of the meat and the flavor of the dish. Also, avoid using raw oil for direct cooking to prevent affecting the taste and health of the dish.

## Honors
- In 2021, it was selected as a candidate for the Sichuan Provincial Tianfu Tourism Delicacy List.
- In 2018, it was awarded as one of the first ten classic Sichuan dishes.
- In 2020, it was selected as one of the 50 classic Sichuan dishes.
- In 2021, it was rated as a provincial-level "Tianfu Famous Dish."

Twice-Cooked Pork is not only a classic representative of Sichuan cuisine but also an important part of Chinese food culture, loved by food enthusiasts both domestically and internationally.
